news.title: Tata Value Homes to invest Rs 600 crore at its Eureka Park project in Noida
news.para: Sanjay Dutt, CEO, Tata Realty said, "With Eureka Park Phase 2, we will be adding approximately 650 units of 3BHK to address the demands of the home buyers in the region. We would be investing around Rs. 600 crore for the development of this phase."

news.title: Gurugram civic body gives clean chit to construction waste management firm
news.para: According to the previous probe report, the C&D waste concessionaire had sublet 100% of its work to the third company in a breach of the concession agreement signed on December 13, 2016.

news.title: Building material prices hit the roof
news.para: Prices of sand, iron, bricks, cement, hardware products, M sand, wood, plywood, and other essentials are skyrocketing. Most of these building material prices increased to up to 40 per cent.

news.title: Bengaluru: Government issues ordinance to validate BBMP's powers to levy building plan fee
news.para: ​The ordinance comes in the wake of the high court’s verdict in August that said the Palike had no legal sanction to levy such a fee.

news.title: M-sand must draw same levy as natural sand, says court
news.para: A division bench headed by Justice S Sujatha observed this while allowing a petition filed by M/s Robo Silicon Private Limited, a Bengaluru-based firm involved in manufacture and sale of M-sand, which is marketed as Robo sand.

news.title: Tamil Nadu CM launches PSU's cement brand 'Valimai'
news.para: Portland Pozzolana Cement (PPC) and Ordinary Portland Cement (OPC) grades are the two Valimai varieties introduced in the market, Industries Minister Thangam Thenarasu said, adding the government sector would use it.

news.title: Property prices may go up by 10-15% due to sharp rise in raw materials cost: CREDAI
news.para: Delays in construction caused by lockdowns, curfews, shortage of labour leading to increased labour cost leading to a direct increase in construction cost anywhere between 10% to 15% in the last 18 months.

news.title: CBDT detects Rs 75 crore black income after raids on real estate groups in AP, Telangana
news.para: "The search operation has resulted in the detection of undisclosed income to the tune of about Rs 75 crore," the CBDT said in a statement.

news.title: Police oppose Ansals' plea, say need to restore faith in justice delivery system
news.para: The submissions were made during the hearing of appeals filed by the Ansal brothers against an order under which they were convicted and sentenced to seven-year jail for tampering with evidence in the Uphaar fire tragedy.

news.title: TARC in talks with global funds to sell non core assets
news.para: The company has recently concluded its warehousing asset sale to Blackstone Inc. (BREP) for Rs 295 crore in September 2021

news.title: DTCP forms five teams to enforce construction ban in Gurugram
news.para: “In case any construction activity is noticed, the teams will stop it on the spot and submit reports to the office of the district town planner (DTCP) daily," an official said.

news.title: Evergrande chief's luxury assets in focus as his company scrambles to pay debts
news.para: Chinese authorities have told Evergrande chairman Hui Ka Yan, 63, to use some of his personal wealth to help pay bondholders, two separate people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters last month.

news.title: Shares of Kaisa's property services unit slide as trading resumes
news.para: ​Trading in Kaisa Group and its three units listed in Hong Kong were suspended on Nov. 5 pending "inside information" from the company. Kaisa Group remains suspended, while the three units resumed trading on Tuesday.

news.title: JC World Hospitality directors arrested for misappropriating funds
news.para: Investigation revealed that their company had launched a project in 2014 and received money from the buyers who were promised that they would be given possession of their respective units within 30 months from the date of booking, the police said.

news.title: Land Securities reports $370 million profit before tax in H1 2021
news.para: Land Securities said it was seeing higher demand for work spaces with more room, often for multiple floors within a building, as it reported a return to profit for the half-year thanks to rent levels in London recovering from their COVID-19 pandemic lows.
